description: All agents must output a single JSON object with these required keys.
rules: Return ONLY valid JSON. No markdown fences. No extra commentary.
Use double quotes for all JSON keys and string values.
deliverable_markdown must be a string (can contain markdown).
updated_state must be an object ({} if no updates).
open_questions must be an array ([] if none).
If information is missing, add a question to open_questions instead of inventing facts.
